overview:
Founded in 2005, ITverse specializes in web development, data backup & recovery and IT consulting services for enterprises and SMBs. Its a company with ample amount of flexibility. Our philosophy is “complete customer satisfaction” which makes us a people oriented company, wherein we work person-to-person and not business-to-business.

IT and Custom Software Development Services:

Custom Software and Web Development: Our team of experts are well versed in latest web, desktop and mobile software technologies to build custom solutions that you can deploy for your customers and or employees.

LAN Setup â€“ If you have more than 1 computer, (PC, Mac, Xbox 360, etc,) at home or in an office you will want them to connect to the Internet. You will also probably want them to communicate with each other and share printers, etc. Itverseâ€™s pros can setup LAN networks for file sharing, printer sharing and resource sharing with enterprises or SMBs

Wi-Fi Setup â€“ Running a business with lot of customer foot traffic? Would like to provide wireless access to your patrons. We can hel setup WPS (Wi-Fi Protected System) in you cafÃ© or restaurant so your customer can have full access while your systems are not compromised.

Security â€“ We will secure your networks through advanced firewall configuration, patch management, SPAM filtering, antivirus, penetration testing and make sure your datacenter has solid physical security.

IT Consulting â€“ With Itverse SysIT, you get access to our certified IT consultants with practices in key areas of today’s technologies

Application and Network Management â€“ Our certified engineers will perform all essential IT tasks to help your business be most competitive in today’s work environment.

Web Development Services

At ITverse we understand that it difficult to build that one precise business presence on the web which will cut across the market clutter and showcase your innovative business-critical solutions and services for your customers? ITverse has strategically designed its solutions and services to cater to the unique individual business needs of the clients. We have successfully helped our clients achieve their business objectives through cost-effective solutions and high quality programming, ensuring best practices at all times.

We at ITverse, are a crew of highly dedicated, skilled and hard working professionals who have continually enhanced the most powerful marketing tool of our clients to build their online identity and brand â€“ their website! The website design that we create reflects the quality, image, lifestyle and status that you wish your brand to be associated with. Our arty designs liven up your brand and give your business a thrust.

We understands the importance of the â€˜rightâ€™ web technologies for your website. Our technical experts possess in-depth knowledge of design and expertise in various scripting and coding languages such as HTML, XHTML, SQL, JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, ASP, C++ and Perl. We also hold proficiency in CSS, Joomla, Magento, CMS.

Data Backup Services

Itverse Online Backup Service is a secure, easy to use backup system for businesses. Our customers can’t afford to lose data or incur downtime and we understand the importance of resolving issues quickly and completely. If your business matters find out how we provide an enterprise grade service for small and medium size business.

Our Custom Software â€“ used on over thousands of computers worldwide it provides a simple user interface that allows complete control over your backup. What to backup, when to backup and where to backup are all up to you. Once configured the backups occur automatically during the time you specify.

Reliable Access â€“ your data is available whenever and wherever you need it. When needed, you can quickly recover files without delay.

Amazon EC2 & S3 Data Centers â€“ we are partnered with Amazon EC2 and Cloud S3 Storage and all customer data is backed up to the world’s most secure facilities in the East Coast of United States where it’s stored securely yet accessible to you at any time, 24x7x365.

Security @ Rest and In Motion â€“ 256 bit AES file encryption to secure files that are then sent to Amazons highly secure data centers and mirrored to a second data center for full fail-over redundancy. Data stays always stays encrypted send over secure SSH tunnel and is always protected. Fully managed, our backups are simple, secure and supported

Compliance â€“ backing up consistently with our service demonstrates compliance with government and external regulatory agencies including HIPPA requirements. 1 Support â€“ we do not hide from our customers. Phone, email and chat options allow you to contact us easily. Support is always free!
